database.name: VIEW OPCRM_PRODUCTVIEW_V
database.view: SELECT get_uuid() AS opcrm_productview_v_id, p.ad_client_id, p.ad_org_id, p.isactive, p.created, p.createdby, p.updated, p.updatedby, p.m_product_id, p.name, p.description, p.upc, p.em_opcrm_upc2 AS upc2, p.em_opcrm_upc3 AS upc3, p.m_product_category_id, p.c_taxcategory_id, p.ad_image_id, plist.m_pricelist_id, plist.istaxincluded, plistver.isactive AS activeversion, pprice.pricelist, pprice.pricestd FROM m_product p LEFT JOIN m_productprice pprice ON p.m_product_id = pprice.m_product_id LEFT JOIN m_pricelist_version plistver ON plistver.m_pricelist_version_id = pprice.m_pricelist_version_id LEFT JOIN m_pricelist plist ON plist.m_pricelist_id = plistver.m_pricelist_id
